name: nginx-prestashop
description: A dockerized version of [PrestaShop](https://www.prestashop.com/) using the latest stable versions of [Nginx](https://www.nginx.com/), [PHP FastCGI Process Manager](http://php.net/manual/en/book.fpm.php) and [MySQL](https://www.mysql.com) linked together by [docker-compose](https://docs.docker.com/compose/).
author: Simon Bustamante
